title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Jess and Julian
description:
Jess and Julian talk Zizek, Deconstruction, the motivation of God in creating, balance, and the radicalism of Jesus.

This conversation gets cut short, but is still a good one nonetheless.

Join the ConverZation.  Talk to PVK Randos and their ilk here:
https://discord.gg/zdjzsFu

Check out Paul Vanderklay's channel here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg
